room_title: Escape room "A Quiet Place" by HD Escape Rooms Westminster in Denver
room_description:
This officially licensed room allows you to step into the world of Paramount Motion Pictures, A Quite Place, and A Quite Place Part 2. HD Escape Rooms has been granted exclusive access to recreate this modern horror thriller where you become the protagonist. Complete the room successfully and enter to win free Pre-Screening passes to the upcoming Film A Quite Place Part 2 and other great prizes.
Days after they have arrived, it has been discovered that the mysterious creatures attack sound. Trapped in the basement you must alert the others of their presence as the creatures draw near. As your fight for survival in silence remember, if they hear you they hunt you.
